statements: SELECT * FROM medical_supplies
SELECT name, quantity, location FROM medical_supplies ORDER BY expiration_date DESC
SELECT id, name FROM medical_supplies WHERE quantity > 50
SELECT * FROM medical_supplies WHERE location = 'Warehouse A' ORDER BY created_at ASC
SELECT name, expiration_date FROM medical_supplies WHERE quantity <= 10
SELECT id, name, expiration_date, quantity, location FROM medical_supplies WHERE expiration_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY name
SELECT name, location FROM medical_supplies WHERE quantity > 50 AND location = 'Storage Room A' ORDER BY expiration_date DESC
SELECT MAX(quantity) as highest_quantity, MIN(quantity) as lowest_quantity FROM medical_supplies GROUP BY location HAVING location IN ('Storage Room A', 'Storage Room B')
SELECT * FROM medical_supplies WHERE location LIKE '%Room%' ORDER BY created_at LIMIT 10
SELECT id, name, expiration_date, location FROM medical_supplies WHERE quantity < 10 OR location = 'Emergency Room' ORDER BY expiration_date ASC
SELECT * FROM medical_supplies;
SELECT name, quantity FROM medical_supplies WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT name, expiration_date FROM medical_supplies ORDER BY expiration_date ASC;
SELECT location_name, address, contact_person FROM supply_locations;
SELECT * FROM medical_supplies WHERE location='Hospital A';
SELECT name, expiration_date, quantity FROM medical_supplies ORDER BY expiration_date DESC, quantity ASC;
SELECT * FROM medical_supplies WHERE location = 'Room A' AND expiration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT name, expiration_date FROM medical_supplies WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY name;
SELECT location_name, address, contact_person FROM supply_locations WHERE location_name LIKE '%Hospital%' ORDER BY location_name;
SELECT name, quantity, location FROM medical_supplies WHERE expiration_date < '2023-06-30' ORDER BY quantity DESC, location ASC;
SELECT * FROM medical_supplies;
SELECT supply_name, quantity FROM medical_supplies WHERE quantity > 50;
SELECT supply_name, expiration_date FROM medical_supplies ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT supply_name, quantity, location FROM medical_supplies WHERE location = 'Hospital A';
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM supply_locations;
SELECT supply_name, quantity FROM medical_supplies WHERE expiration_date > '2023-01-01'
SELECT supply_name, quantity, location_name FROM medical_supplies JOIN supply_locations ON medical_supplies.location = supply_locations.location_name
SELECT supply_name, quantity, location_name FROM medical_supplies JOIN supply_locations ON medical_supplies.location = supply_locations.location_name WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY quantity DESC
SELECT supply_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM medical_supplies GROUP BY supply_name HAVING total_quantity > 500

SELECT location_name, COUNT(supply_id) AS total_supply FROM medical_supplies JOIN supply_locations ON medical_supplies.location = supply_locations.location_name GROUP BY location_name HAVING total_supply > 3
SELECT * FROM Inventory;
SELECT item_name, quantity, expiration_date FROM Inventory WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_contact FROM Suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT item_name, quantity, location FROM Inventory WHERE expiration_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY location;
SELECT location_name, address FROM Locations WHERE address IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM Inventory ORDER BY expiration_date DESC, quantity ASC
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM Inventory WHERE expiration_date >= '2022-12-31'
SELECT t.transaction_id, i.item_name, t.transaction_date FROM Transactions t JOIN Inventory i ON t.item_id = i.item_id WHERE t.quantity > 10
SELECT s.supplier_name, t.transaction_type FROM Suppliers s JOIN Transactions t ON s.supplier_id = t.item_id
SELECT l.location_name, i.item_name FROM Locations l JOIN Inventory i ON l.location_id = i.item_id
SELECT * FROM suppliers;
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name FROM suppliers;
SELECT item_name, quantity, expiration_date FROM supplies;
SELECT location_name FROM locations;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, action_type FROM transactions;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_number FROM suppliers
SELECT item_name, quantity, expiration_date FROM supplies
SELECT location_name FROM locations
SELECT supplier_name, item_name, quantity, expiration_date FROM suppliers INNER JOIN supplies ON suppliers.supplier_id = supplies.supplier_id
SELECT transaction_id, inventory_id, transaction_date, quantity_changed, action_type FROM transactions
